about_the_game:
The Highlander* artifact set gives you great advantages on Mountain terrain. Your squads will be moving even faster there, the army gets bonuses on fighting parameters and science studies accelerate.

Items included:
  • Highlander's Shirt
  • Highlander's Belt
  • Mountain`s Shoes
  • Highlander's Helmet
  • Experience of Mountains
  • Highlander's Talisman
  • Highlander's Talisman
  • Highlander's Glove
  • Highlander's Blade of Fury
  • Mountain`s Shield

* make sure to construct the Vault in your Capital in order to receive the artifacts.
